fields.name: ClientId
fields.description: The msi client id used to collect logging to blob storage. If it's null,backend will pick a registered endpoint identity to auth.

fields.name: DataId
fields.description: The data asset arm resource id. Client side will ensure data asset is pointing to the blob storage, and backend will collect data to the blob storage.

fields.name: SamplingRate
fields.description: The sampling rate for collection. Sampling rate 1.0 means we collect 100% of data by default.
